ComicInfo.Characters: Doc Holliday,Joaquin Murrieta,Bat Masterson,Robert Ford,Jesse James,John Wesley Hardin,Frank James,Cole Younger,Wyatt Earp,Butch Cassidy,Liver-Eatin' Johnson
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:57:13 [Issue ID 4000-161084] urn:comicvine:4000-161084 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:50:24. [Issue ID 348872]
ComicInfo.Series: The Big Book of the Weird Wild West
ComicInfo.Summary: Based on thorough research, THE BIG BOOK OF THE WEIRD WILD WEST presents an unabashed look at the violence, tragedy and strangeness of the American frontier. Using humor and wit to depict tales of cannibalism, gunfights, decapitations, curses, ghosts, cults, lynch mobs, alcoholism, prostitution, and airships, this amusing and informative tome presents the West in an unflattering but accurate fashion. Also included in this black and white comic strip book are the true histories and adventures of such western legends as Jesse James, Doc Holiday, Butch Cassidy, and the infamous Donner Party.
ComicInfo.Title: The Dentist Was a Killer; The Head of Joaquin Murieta; Hell on an Empty Stomach; The Weird & Wooly Robberies of the James Gang; The Sincerest Form of Flattery; Butch Cassidy & the Express Car Guard; Badman or Bust; Mysterious Dave; The Last Outlaw; John Wesley Hardin and the Rustler's Wife; Go West, Young Man-Eater; The Donner Party; Massacre Cave!; Liver-Eatin' Johnson; Stalking Queho; Even Gunfighters Get the Willies; Keeping Up with the Benders; Bill Longley, Lone Killer; Slade: Six-Gun Sadist; Rattlesnake Pit; Ned Buntline: King of the Dime Novelists; Judge Roy Bean: Law West of the Pecos; The Bungling Bandit; The Presidenté's New Clothes; The Girl Who Made Good; The Actor and the Gunfighter; Comedians of Dodge City; The Indian Messiah; Brothers of Blood; Captain Jack; Steven's Saga; The Blue-Eyed Indian; The Great White Buffalo; To Kill a Thunderbird; A Scalp for a Scalp; Wanted: Cherokee Bill; Buffalo Tom; The Late, Great Medicine Show; A Stiff Drink!; Dance Hall Massacre; Gay Caballeros; Cowboygirls; The Black West; A Slice of Vice on the Barbary Coast; Greatly Exaggerated News; Extreme Frontier Sports; Fight of the Century; Lonesome Dromedary; Cowboys vs. the Flying Saucers; Sympathy for the Hangman; White Man Fly Like Bird; The Wire That Tamed the West; A Ghost in the Snow; A Hair-Raising Vision; Diagnosis: Death; A Nightmare in Idaho Territory; Pedro's Last Hand; A Politician's Ghost; The Tommyknockers; The Mystery of the Lady in Blue; Proud Joe; Fool's Gold of the Superstitions; Wolf Man; The Seven Cities of Gold
ComicInfo.Writer: Deb Picker,Rick Klaw,Ben Ostrander,John Whalen,Deb Picker,Rick Klaw,Ben Ostrander,John Whalen
